a2.title: Why is this training important?
a2.text: Excellent service not only resolves demands: it builds trust, strengthens bonds and directly contributes to customer loyalty.

reflexao.text: Before moving on, reflect: When a customer contacts Customer Service, what do you believe they expect to find beyond solving the problem?

p2.title: What is the role of Customer Service?
p2.text1: The Customer Service department is responsible for managing customer relationship channels, including electronic and telephone services.
p2.text2: More than an operational sector, Customer Service is a strategic area, essential for preserving the values, reputation and credibility of the Group's brands.
p2.card_text: Humanized, efficient and high-quality service not only resolves demands: it builds trust, strengthens bonds and directly contributes to customer loyalty.
p2.text3: In addition to the external public, Customer Service also plays a fundamental role in supporting company employees, clarifying doubts about processes, systems and service standards. This action contributes to standardization, internal organization and service excellence.

box_attention.title: Curiosity
box_attention.text: Customer experience studies indicate that a single negative interaction can impact brand perception more than several positive interactions. That's why every contact counts.

p2.text4: Customer Service goes far beyond answering calls. It represents the company's voice in direct contact with the customer. Every interaction influences how the consumer perceives the brand and evaluates their experience.

quiz.question: A frustrated customer contacts because their problem has not yet been resolved. How should a Customer Service operator with a strategic vision approach this service?
quiz.opt_a: A) As an annoyance that should be ended as quickly as possible.
quiz.opt_b: B) As an opportunity to reverse a negative experience and strengthen trust in the brand.
quiz.opt_c: C) As a failure of another department that is not their responsibility.
quiz.opt_d: D) Just following the standard script without showing empathy.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Strategic vision transforms crises into loyalty opportunities.

p3.title: What are our responsibilities?
p3.intro_list: Among the main duties of Customer Service, the following stand out:
p3.intro_p: Customer Service acts as the voice of the company to the customer and the voice of the customer to the company, ensuring a constant flow of information and improvements.
p3.img_alt: Call center team working in modern environment

c1.title: Multichannel Service
c1.text: Offer excellent service through different channels: phone, email, chat and electronic means.

c2.title: Inbound Service
c2.text: Provide information, receive complaints, suggestions and compliments, handle objections and offer solutions.

p3.active_text: Perform outbound services, especially in promotional campaigns and actions related to the Group's Cards:

t1.title: 1. Card activation
t1.text: Contact customers to activate newly issued cards.

t2.title: 2. Profile update
t2.text: Keep customer data always up to date.

t3.title: 3. Promotion communication
t3.text: Inform about exclusive offers and benefits.

t4.title: 4. Cancellation reversal
t4.text: Work to retain customers who wish to cancel services.

a1.title: üìã Management and Continuous Improvement

a1.l2: Act proactively in identifying improvements in scripts and service standards.
a1.l3: Contribute to the continuous evolution of the service provided.

a2.title: üéì Professional development

quiz.question: You notice that several customers are calling with the same question about a new promotion. What is the best attitude aligned with Customer Service's continuous improvement responsibilities?
quiz.opt_a: A) Continue serving each one individually without reporting the fact.
quiz.opt_b: B) Complain to colleagues that customers can't read the terms.
quiz.opt_c: C) Report the observed pattern to the supervisor so that the promotion communication can be adjusted.
quiz.opt_d: D) Tell the customer to look for the information on the website.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Proactivity in identifying patterns helps improve the process for everyone.

p4.title: Why register correctly?
p4.intro: Another essential point in Customer Service work is meeting response deadlines. Well-defined deadlines ensure organization, predictability and efficiency, in addition to showing respect to the customer and strengthening trust in the brand.

special_box.title: ‚ö† Special Deadlines
special_box.l1: Damages: up to 5 business days for response

p4.text_footer: Correct registration of the service category is essential so that the appropriate deadline is respected and the customer receives a response at the right time.

quiz.question: A customer reports they paid the invoice twice. You need to register the service so they can be reimbursed. Why is it crucial to select the 'Duplicate payment' category instead of a generic 'Complaint' category?
quiz.opt_a: A) Because 'Duplicate' has a specific deadline (up to 8 business days) for detailed financial analysis, avoiding false promises of quick resolution.
quiz.opt_b: B) Because 'Complaint' is a category that should only be used for poor service at the physical store.
quiz.opt_c: C) It makes no practical difference, as the customer response deadline is always 2 business days for any case.
quiz.opt_d: D) Just to comply with a bureaucratic formality, with no real impact on case handling.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! The correct category defines the correct deadline (8 days), managing customer expectations.
